channel.title: Changing bank title and log off screen
channel.description: How do I change where it usually says "The Bank of ........." to my server name and also where the log out thing is and what it says. plz help!

item.title: Changing bank title and log off screen
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

Pj owns:

How do I change where it usually says “The Bank of …” to my server name and also where the log out thing is and what it says. plz help!

Mega upload your client.java and send me the link. I use devolution 7 and I can add this, so if you have problems still, give me a upload link for “just” your client.java and I can help you.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing bank title and log off screen

item.title: Changing bank title and log off screen
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

go into client.java hit crtl f and put sendframe126

that brings u to the logout screen and right about it is bank title

Read full topic
item.source: Changing bank title and log off screen

item.title: Changing bank title and log off screen
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“dd, post:2, topic:176297”] public void initialize() { sendQuest("@red@Bank of "+playerName+"", 5383); sendQuest("@red@Rearrange mode:", 5390); sendQuest("@red@Withdraw as:", 5388); sendQuest("@whi@Swap", 8133); sendQuest("@whi@Insert", 8132); sendQuest("@whi@Item", 5389); sendQuest("@whi@Note", 5391);

[code] WriteEnergy();

ReplaceItems(565, 565); // Xerozcheez: Replaces blood runes with ectos
ScanItems(); // Xerozcheez: Catches dupers

            /*EASTER DROP*/
            //if(hasegg == 0)
            //addItem(1961, 1);
            //hasegg = 1;
            /*END OF DROP*/
            sendQuest("@lre@Thank you, "+playerName+", for playing", 2450); CHANGE THIS
            sendQuest("@lre@Fatal ErrÔr", 2451); CHANGE THIS 
            sendQuest("@lre@The Place Called ownage", 2452); CHANGE THIS

[/code][/quote]
EDIT: I know how now.

Read full topic
